resources.name: /google-sign-in
/tasks/:id
resources.description:
error response if user change category of a task that not his/her own
```
{
  "status": 401,
  "messages": [
    "Authorization error. You have no right to access this"
  ]
}
```

error if user have not logged in yet
```
{
  "status": 500,
  "messages": [
    "jwt must be provided"
  ]
}
```

response if successfully changed category
```
{
  "id": 6,
  "title": "coba akun baru",
  "category": "Doing",
  "UserId": 2,
  "createdAt": "2020-12-04T11:28:03.181Z",
  "updatedAt": "2020-12-04T13:31:24.151Z"
}
```

resources.name: /tasks/:id
resources.description:
error deleting task that doesn't exists
```
{
  "status": 404,
  "messages": [
    "task is not found"
  ]
}
```
error deleting task that's not his/her own
```
{
  "status": 401,
  "messages": [
    "Authorization error. You have no right to access this"
  ]
}
```
sucessfully delete his/her task
```
{
  "id": 7,
  "title": "ini baru bisa",
  "category": "To Do",
  "UserId": 2,
  "createdAt": "2020-12-04T11:32:09.366Z",
  "updatedAt": "2020-12-04T13:26:18.678Z"
}
```

resources.name: /tasks/:id
resources.description:
error when a not logged in user edit a task
```
{
  "status": 401,
  "messages": [
    "you are not auntheticated"
  ]
}
```
error when updating task that's not her/his own
```
{
  "status": 401,
  "messages": [
    "Authorization error. You have no right to access this"
  ]
}
```
successfully update task
```
{
  "id": 6,
  "title": "kuy makan",
  "category": "Doing",
  "UserId": 2,
  "createdAt": "2020-12-04T11:28:03.181Z",
  "updatedAt": "2020-12-04T13:39:16.432Z"
}
```
